name: Jayro's Keys - A Piano for Gameboy Color! v1.0
name_original: Jayro's Keys - A Piano for Gameboy Color! v1.0
description:
This is a simple piano I made for Gameboy and Gameboy Color.

You can hold a note as long as you'd like. I created this ROM using GB Studio v2.00 Beta 5. All artwork was created by me.

FEATURES:

-8 playable notes using all 8 buttons of the Gameboy.

PHYSICAL COPIES ARE COMING SOON!

IF YOU LIKE MY WORK, YOU CAN ALWAYS LEAVE A TIP:

https://ko-fi.com/jayrojones

Changelog for v1.0:

-First release, fully working and bug-free.

Known Issues:

There aren't enough Gameboy buttons to add the black keys.
